reviews.review_msg: Always great to take class with Alex! He is well organized and an interested professor. He has high standards, but will reward you for hard work.
Very well organized teacher. He is understanding and approachable. Class was much better than I expected it to be. Assignments are hard but very fair!

The assignments are hard, but the prof is helpful (funny too) and the lectures and slides are well organized. He tries to be objective about controversial topics, so you don't have to agree with him to get a good grade.
A Clapp reminds me of Tony Blair. His enthusiasm makes commodity markets worth the attention.

very nice and smart prof. it was a very helpful course.. I learned so many things and it was interesting!  you don't need to go to class, just get all the lecture tapes before the final and you can still get a good grade
He uses good slides in class, but he's disorganized and he needs to be more interactive.  Interesting material though.
Average teacher, nothing special. Has his favourites list. Interesting topics, but learnt nothing substantial.
Good teaching style- subject matter can get boring though. He does his best to keep things upbeat

Excellent Prof.  One of the best at SFU in my opinion.  Extremely knowledgable and enthusisastic about teaching.  Excellent organization and clarity.  Lots of notes and pretty interesting anecdotes.  You'll love him.
Too hard. Lectures interesting but hes hard marker. Would not regrade my essay.
Great teacher. A little disorganized though.

Very unorganized. Fell behind syllabus and went the WHOLE SEMESTER without creating a course canvas page despite promises that he would get it done by the second week. Instead, sent everything out by email. Frequently interrupts students and guest lecturers when they are speaking. Often gets side tracked with topics irrelevant to course material.
John is a great guy, and a great professor. He is really fair, and he gives detailed expectations for his projects and assignments. I have two other classes with him. I would recommend his classes!
